abstrac: Working hard to be the best!
bio:
Hi my name is Christopher, I grew up in a small business enviorment as my Father owned and operated a service station in a rural neighborhood for twenty five years. I learned from a young age what the words financial statements, Contracts and customer service meant. 

As I grew into a teenager I was submerged in the daily operation of the family business where I learned the day to day operations.  As times changed and small privately owned busnisess began to disappear we were forced out by the larger corporations. 

With no employment and a lack of education I spent the next ten years operatng a tractor trailer. In 2010 after watching life change things as it will I lost my Father to Sucide and began to reevalute my own life.

At ths point I decided to further my education. WIth a strong yearning to suceed in the business world I graduted in June of 2013 with a diploma in Business Administration with a concentration in Marketing. 

Since my graduation I have also gained skills in computer programing. I am currently fluent in Php,Javascript,Html,Mysql,CSS3 and some Jquery. I enjoy working most with Php and have a very anylitcal mind.

I have a strong desire to suceed and my success depends on your sucess. 
I am looking to help small business owners in becoming more competive in the global marketplace.

I offer web design and data base construction that is customiaed to fit the users needs. I also offer business plans,Marketing plans and business services such as Business cards, Advertisments, Google Adwords campaigns etc...

I would love to invest my time into projects that will not only assist myself in growing a client base, but also assist you in growing your business. We all know that business is not an easy road, However it is the road we have choosen to go down. 

I am willing to work as hard for you as I would for myself.
I am willing to work any hours, Terms of payment are easy. As long as I get paid I am happy.

abstrac: Passion is in Video Games and Computer Science
bio:
Hello!

My name is Morad Muslimany, a 1992-born Computer Scientist, learning Computer Science for B.Sc. at the Ben Gurion University of the Negev, Beersheba, Israel.

I have had deep passion for Video Game Development and the Game Development industry since I could walk! Trying my best to learn it and gain experience at my own cost, time and effort.

My ultimate passion, love and dream is to see myself working at a major game development company, especially at London, U.K.,, my favorite city of all time. (But will, of course, consider other European countries/U.S.A. upon a good opportunity.)

I have experience with major and the strongest programming languages, freelancing and experience-aimed.

My assignments in Computer Science courses at university gain the most points, though I have a problem with exams (stress) that causes me to gain a mark that does not indicate my powers.

I love Physics and Mathematics, especially when they evolve themselves with the cover of Game Development.

I have been accredited by my colleagues, professors and daily-life contacts as a person who is so focused on work, and whose perfection at the assignments given to is of high priority, and of course, deep passion and ultimate commitment for my dreams.

A great teamworker, with nice attitude towards colleagues and always raising the good flag to help those who work with me, and an aspiring person to learn from people who are more experienced than I am.

I love doing extra hours at work/office if the project's perfection depends on it.

Available in and out of office/workplace/house, also at weekends.

Several ways are available to contact me: E-Mail, Phone, Skype, LinkedIn and Facebook (check out the top of the page!)

I love Beer, Nightlife, and working while Elvis's playing.

Always and forever: Working for (and -not- waiting) for fulfilling my ultimate dream; a seat at one of the most giant video game development companies of all time.
Can work mostly on weekends, and up to 2-3 hours per day since I am a Computer Science student. Payment is preferable on Paypal, and before I accept any project I should skype with the employer.

Our Goal
